data.text:
@CDCofBC Have you heard of the preeminent scientific journal Nature? 

How should “most people manage” depleting grey/brain matter from #COVID? 🤔🤦‍♂️

/s A hot shower? A glass of cool water? 
Same question for the associated  cognitive decline. Maybe a humidifier?

https://t.co/aaXdeoxoIq
@CDCofBC End the mandates. My kids are masked all day every day in school.  Elites are mask-free. End the restrictions! https://t.co/4EyDVh1Mu8
@canbestupid @CDCofBC Whoa whoa whoa.  Who wants to prevent deaths here?   Thats just for lowly citizens.   The 'elites' have political and financial gains to think about.   Bigger picture.  /s
@CDCofBC If this is the case why was the social fabric destroyed and why were millions coerced into taking an experimental gene therapy?

@CDCofBC If only there were a safe, effective, inexpensive and readily available prophylaxis and early treatment option...
https://t.co/RoU8zL2KEN

@canbestupid @CDCofBC Link to the published peer-reviewed study in the International Journal of Infectious Diseases referenced in the video:
https://t.co/OeMARRQu7U

@CDCofBC So, you're confirming that covid19 (Omicron) is similar to the normal flu we used to get. 
It's time to remove all mandates and restrictions.

@CDCofBC Imagine if the College of Physicians and Surgeons allowed outpatient treatment to limit the amount of viral replication for all those hospitalized people. We may have much fewer deaths. https://t.co/3uWIgLVhIq
